pitrou commented on a change in pull request #12259:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12259#discussion_r791949445



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/aggregate_internal.h
##########
@@ -173,7 +174,7 @@ enable_if_t<std::is_floating_point<SumType>::value, SumType> SumArray(
       block_sum = sum[cur_level];
       sum[cur_level] = 0;
       ++cur_level;
-      DCHECK_LT(cur_level, levels);
+      assert(cur_level, levels);

Review comment:
       ```suggestion
         assert(cur_level < levels);
   ```




--

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Building with GCC 7.5 currently fails with the following internal error. We need to support this GCC version for CUDA-enabled and PPC64LE builds on conda-forge. See also the updated conda recipe in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11916
{code:java}
2022-01-24T14:18:48.2261185Z [182/405] Building CXX object src/arrow/CMakeFiles/arrow_objlib.dir/compute/kernels/aggregate_basic.cc.o
2022-01-24T14:18:48.2261792Z FAILED: src/arrow/CMakeFiles/arrow_objlib.dir/compute/kernels/aggregate_basic.cc.o 
2022-01-24T14:18:48.2268608Z /build/arrow-cpp-ext_1643033227908/_build_env/bin/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu-c++ -DARROW_EXPORTING -DARROW_HDFS -DARROW_JEMALLOC -DARROW_JEMALLOC_INCLUDE_DIR="" -DARROW_MIMALLOC -DARROW_WITH_BACKTRACE -DARROW_WITH_BROTLI -DARROW_WITH_BZ2 -DARROW_WITH_LZ4 -DARROW_WITH_RE2 -DARROW_WITH_SNAPPY -DARROW_WITH_TIMING_TESTS -DARROW_WITH_UTF8PROC -DARROW_WITH_ZLIB -DARROW_WITH_ZSTD -DURI_STATIC_BUILD -I/build/arrow-cpp-ext_1643033227908/work/cpp/build/src -I/build/arrow-cpp-ext_1643033227908/work/cpp/src /build/arrow-cpp-ext_1643033227908/work/cpp/build/xsimd_ep/src/xsimd_ep-install/include -isystem /build/arrow-cpp-ext_1643033227908/work/cpp/thirdparty/hadoop/include -Wno-noexcept-type -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -std=c++17 -fmessage-length=0 -mcpu=power8 -mtune=power8 -ftree-vectorize -fPIC -fstack-protector-strong -fno-plt -O3 -pipe -isystem 2022-01-24T14:18:48.2411166Z 	/home/conda/feedstock_root/build_artifacts/ctng-compilers_1618239179734/work/.build/powerpc64le-conda-linux-gnu/src/gcc/gcc/cp/pt.c:16613
2022-01-24T14:18:48.2411613Z Please submit a full bug report,
2022-01-24T14:18:48.2411904Z with preprocessed source if appropriate.

fields.summary: [C++] Compilation with GCC 7.5 fails in aggregate_basic.cc

comments.body: Is there an easy way to reproduce using Docker?
[~uwe] how can we reproduce this in Arrow's CI? The ubuntu 18.04 builds compile with GCC 7.5 but this error doesn't occur there.
Disabling CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD and GCS together fixes the issue. I'll try out now what the actual cause is but this is then not a release blocker anymore.
Ongoing work on this is at [https://github.com/conda-forge/ctng-compilers-feedstock/pull/82]
This has been an internal issue in GCC and I have applied the same patch that Ubuntu has in conda-forge.
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
